Доставка по Україні здійснюється Новою п: Delivery in Ukraine is carried out by Nova Poshta.
При оформленні замовлення до 14:00 товар: If the order is placed before 14:00, the item will be shipped on the same day (if available).
При оформленні замовлення після 14:00 то: If the order is placed after 14:00, the item will be shipped the next day (if available).
To lockers: free for orders over 200 UAH.
Ha відділення: від 500 грн. безкоштовно,: To the branch: free for orders over 500 UAH, except for aquariums, aquarium substrates, cages, and large-sized goods. Wooden, silica gel, and mineral fillers are included in free delivery to the branch up to 30 kg, over 30 kg - at the buyer's expense.
Адресна доставка кур`єрами Нової пошти:: Address delivery by Nova Poshta couriers: free for orders over 1000 UAH.
Для замовлень на суму менше ніж 200 грн: For orders less than 200 UAH - delivery according to the operator`s tariffs.
Відправлення замовлень, що узгоджені з м: Orders confirmed with managers on Sunday will be dispatched on Monday.
Після відправки Вашого замовлення, номер: After sending your order, the number of the shipping and transport invoice will come to the phone indicated in the order in the form of an SMS. With this number, you will be able to receive the goods at the representation of the transport company in your city upon presentation of a passport.
При доставці товару будь-яким перевізник: When delivering goods by any carrier, the buyer is obliged to check the integrity and completeness of the goods directly in the carrier`s office. We always pack orders very carefully and only put high-quality and intact goods inside. However, sometimes the cargo gets damaged during transportation. In case of defects, you should act in accordance with the carrier`s internal rules.
При отриманні товару у компанії-перевізн: When receiving the goods from the carrier company:
Оглянути цілісність посилки безпосереднь: Inspect the integrity of the package directly at the Nova Poshta branch.
Звірити кількість місць в TTH з фактично: Check the number of places in TTH with the actually received.
Перевірити цілісність упаковки (звертайт: Check the integrity of the packaging (pay attention to tears, dents, indentations).
Розкрити упаковку, звірити вміст з товар: Open the package, check the contents with the invoice, and inspect for any damages.
У разі виявлення пошкоджень або недостач: If you find any damages or shortages, you need to call us at 080000000 and immediately at the carrier`s office, draw up a claim act, in which you should record the condition of the packaging, the presence of markings on the packaging (fragile), and describe the damages or missing items.
Якщо Ви, при складанні акта, вказуєте се: If you, when drawing up the act, indicate yourself as the recipient of compensation, the replacement of the damaged goods or refund is not made. Remember that claims to the carrier for missing places, transportation costs, and damages are made by the recipient.
При недотриманні вище перелічених пункті: If the above points are not followed, we do not accept claims for damaged or lost goods.
Зверніть увагу, що Ваше замовлення збері: Please note that your order is stored in the carrier`s office for 4 days, and on the 5th day, the order is automatically returned to the sender.
Так, Ви можете замовити адресну доставку: Yes, you can request address delivery in your locality. The delivery will be carried out by Nova Poshta couriers. The cost of delivery will remain the same * and will also be 59 UAH*. Lifting bulky goods from 30 to 100 kg is paid separately. Cost of lifting: 20-60 UAH / floor depending on weight, dimensions, and complexity of the lift.
Чи можу я замовити доставку у поштомат Н: Can I request delivery to a Nova Poshta locker?
Reference on the Nova Poshta website.
Так. Ви маєте таку можливість. Термін зб: Yes, you have this option. The storage period is 3 calendar days. After that, the parcel will be moved to the nearest Nova Poshta branch to the locker.
Як оплатити послуги доставки у поштомат?: How to pay for delivery services at the locker? Delivery services can be paid using the Nova Poshta mobile app or on the company`s website. Please note that it is not possible to pay in cash on the spot, as the locker does not have the technical capabilities for this.
